content: meet roo the baby joey from a a milne s winnie the pooh stories and inspired by ernest shepard s illustrations here s a little more about my roo - knitted flat with minimal seams - the limbs are knitted as i-cords and there are directions for both dpn i-cord and single point needle i-cord - i ve used 6mm black toy safety eyes for this - all the ingredients are written within the pattern with links to yarn and eyes - yarn-wise i ve suggested cardiff cashmere classic but you can of course use your own choice of yarn there are more pooh patterns if you want to make a set pooh https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/honey-bear-13 1 piglet https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/piglet-doll-2 2 eeyore https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/eeyore-20 3 roo tigger - to come wol - to come hope you enjoy giving this one ago claire x 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/honey-bear-13 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/piglet-doll-2 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/eeyore-20
